name: Jim Henson
alma_mater: University of Maryland, College Park, B.S. 1960
occupation: Puppeteer, artist, cartoonist, inventor, screenwriter, songwriter, musician, film director, producer
known_for: Creator of ''The Muppets'' (examples: Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear)
boards: Jim Henson Foundation, The Jim Henson Company, Jim Henson's Creature Shop
children: Lisa Henson (born 1960), Cheryl Henson (born 1961), Brian Henson (born 1963), John Henson (puppeteer)
awards: Courage Conscience Award, Emmy Award, Disney Legend Award
